author: taylor
msg: New option for JR.p: The portlet control can be either shown or hidden when a portlet does not have view access
Defaults to true, the decorator is now hidden

author: taylor
msg: Enhancement to NOT display the control decorator in view mode if the
current security context does not allow access to the portlet
I will next make this check optional for backward compatibility
